DOC.brief_title: Cytokines of Patients With Transversus Abdominis Plane Block After Laparoscopic Colonic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators designed a study to determine whether combined general-transversus abdominis plane block anesthesia or standard general anaesthetic would provide same level of cytokine in patients undergoing Laparoscopic Colonic Surgery.
DOC.criteria: •Participants were deemed eligible if they were candidates for spinal anesthesia undergoing Laparoscopic Colonic Surgery •Existing cognitive impairment as evidenced by MiniMental State Examination scores below 24 (of the 30 possible points) A history of neurological and psychiatric diseases including stroke, and psychosis Severe visual or hearing impairment Unwillingness to comply with the protocol or procedures
